column4: can someone tell me how to have git replace all the files in a directory? im getting an error that says the directory is not empty
huh? in a checkout ? or what are you trying to do ?
im trying to compile gnome-shell, im reading this page:http://www.webupd8.org/2010/10/install-gnome-shell-from-git-in-ubuntu.html
it says i need a newer version of libnotify but when i run the commands on the website i get an error about libnotify already existing and the directory not being empty
what command gives that error ?
git clone git://git.gnome.org/libnotify
you have a prior libnotify directory in the directory you run this on ?
yes
i believe it is an older version
that's why im getting the error during the build phase
well you have to remove or move it out of the way .
how can i do that?
im not very good with CLI
mv  libnotify libnotify.old ?
then run the clone
ok i'll try that
that worked, i believe, now let's hope the build phase works. :)
you did not find a ppa with gnome-shell ?
yeah but i wanted the newest version
i guess if this build doesnt work i will try that
i got the same error during teh build phase, any ideas?
no sorry
right click on the folder you want to share. choose sharing options
